about_the_game:
This is a mystery DLC of Cyber Agent,, if you download it you will get lucky!

Feature:
- 1 3d cyberpunck city scene
- 2 3d characters
- 20 music
- 7 animations
- 6 story scene
- Visual novels with multiple endings

This DLC may cover sexuality, alcohol and drug use, and may also cover sensitive topics such as sexual assault, self-harm, etc. It is only suitable for responsible and self-controlled users.

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC may cover sexuality, alcohol and drug use, and may also cover sensitive topics such as sexual assault, self-harm, etc. It is only suitable for responsible and self-controlled users.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This is a mystery DLC of Cyber Agent, if you download it you will get lucky!
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
